publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2614 Trish Godman: Oxfam Scotland—That the Parliament commends the campaign by Oxfam Scotland to encourage people to give foreign currency notes and coins made worthless by the euro to any of Oxfam Scotland’s 68 shops; believes that Oxfam Scotland will put such currency to very good use, once exchanged in the developing world, and urges all those with soon-to-be useless coins and small denomination notes, of any of the twelve EU member states which have signed up to the euro, left over from holidays and visits to respond to this excellent initiative and by doing so helping poor people to live more tolerable lives. Supported by: Colin Campbell*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*, Margaret Jamieson*

S1M-2614 Trish Godman: Oxfam Scotland-That the Parliament commends the campaign by Oxfam Scotland to encourage people to give foreign currency notes and coins made worthless by the euro to any of Oxfam Scotland's 68 shops; believes that Oxfam Scotland will put such currency to very good use, once exchanged in the developing world, and urges all those with soon-to-be useless coins and small denomination notes, of any of the twelve EU member states which have signed up to the euro, left over from holidays and visits to respond to this excellent initiative and by doing so helping poor people to live more tolerable lives. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Michael Matheson, Donald Gorrie, Margaret Jamieson, Cathy Peattie*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Bristow Muldoon*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Sarah Boyack*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Christine Grahame*, Shona Robison*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, Johann Lamont*, Mr John McAllion*, Scott Barrie*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Fiona McLeod*, Irene Oldfather*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Des McNulty*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Richard Lochhead*, Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Susan Deacon*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Bill Butler*
S1M-2614 Oxfam Scotland (lodged on 16 January 2002) Jackie Baillie*
